price: Walipo ingia kwake na wakasema: Salama! Yeye akasema: Hakika sisi tunakuogopeni.
arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمۡ وَجِلُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Muaminifu! Watajie pale walipo ingia kwake, naye akawaogopa. Wao wakamwambia: Amani kwako, na tulia! Yeye akasema: Sisi tunakuogopeni, kwani mmetujia kwa ghafla, sio wakati wa dasturi wa kufika wageni, na hatujui mna nini!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh dakhalū ʿalayhi faqālū salāman qāla innā minkum wajilūna
